entries.text: Read books against their intended grain to derive maximum benefit.

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: Temporary restrictions are necessary for sustained intellectual vitality.

entries.text: When faced with criticism, consider your own faults before reacting.
